reviews.review:
I'll keep it short and sweet.
The game is perfect for my husband and I, We had a tonne of fun in game playing as surivors.
The only recurring flaw is that Co-op is majorly bugged and requires you to constantly click ready for 5-10 minutes before finding a match.
The game only having American servers also wasn't very noticable for me in Australia (I do have fast internet though so keep that in mind.). 
Verdict: Game is awesome once you pass the troubling 'survive with friends' lobby.

I don't get why this game has had so much hate, i personally have not had any problem with finding lobbys or anything related to connection, never ever had any lagspike or smh. And even if some people have had problems joing lobbys then ive never heard it beeing more than 5 minutes wait and for me thats fine as the game is fairly new. Otherwise in gameplay ive had much fun playing killer AND survivor, never have i found it "unbalanced" or something, but as the game is new and there isn't much content or maps i give this game a 7.5/10
Very good. Came through the door around 9am and we played about 9 hours
Sat with 4 friends trying to Que into a Survive with friends game for 35 minutes. Didn't get a single game. Games great when you actually get to play it.

Game is a mess, matchmaking is absolutely unforgivably bad, game is unbalanced in the killer's favor. Unlockable perks are probably a bad choice. I wish I could return this game but friends talked me in to it and kept me playing it for too long.
非常喜欢这款游戏，希望可以把网络延迟调成可显示
搞笑游戏，并不恐怖
游戏bug太多了，请开发者团队及时修复bug，加速外挂有很多人在游戏中使用，建议加强系统检测外挂能力，外挂严重的破坏了游戏的平衡，极大的影响了其他玩家的体验。

otimo jogo, podem comprar sem medo... nao pera

I would definitely not recommend anyone to buy this game, since it is clearly in a beta stage. This so-called asymmetrical game is rather just an one-sided game in favor of the killer. As a casual player who did not unlock all of the perks for each survivor it is almost always impossible to escape. Especially since the last patches (lesser amount of pallets, father lunge attacks by the killers) and the new introduced killer there is almost no counterplay for the survivors. In most cases the killer just needs to find one of the survivors and then simply camps the hook (no punishment and no counterplay, since you need to rescue hooked teammates to get enough points).

Tl:dr: unbalanced game; play killer or dont even start to play

Update: Fix the fucking matchmaking! It is not possible to win any games anymore unless the killer has mercy, cause you are matched with newbies that don`t know what to do. It is basically a 1v1...

This game is tons of fun, and a great game if you want to play either to survive with friends, or if youre just looking for a game to slaughter all the enemies! Just don`t camp, because thats no fun for anyone.
Great Game
Nice game )
best game man

Played about 20 hours so far. Not a bad game. Addictive. Good to play with friends. The price is about right. Worth getting especially if your just a PC gamer. On the flip side, it's still a bit buggy as it's fairly a new game. Has some in game issues such as experienced killers will hurt everyone to a crawl then wait for everyone to bleed out. Which can take a very long time and it's very annoying. Hopefully this will be addressed soon. People also complain about camping the hook that you put survivors on. This is kinda up in the air as it bogs the killer's time down as well. Time that can be spent working on generators anyways.

All around a decent game tho. Stands out in the vast amount of trash Steam has lol.
10/10 matchmaking

Velice dobrý nápad na multiplayerovou hororovou hru, kterou není určitě duležité představovat, protože každý, kdo se alespoň jednou za čas koukne na Herdyna, Baxe nebo Wedryho, tak jí musí prostě znát. A také proto jsem se kvůli nim nechal zlákat a stáhnul jsem si hru ve FREE WEEKENDU a nelituji toho. 

Ale teď k tomu, kdyby někdo nevěděl o co v této hře jde. 

V Dead by Daylight stojí proti sobě 4 přeživší (Survivors) a 1 zabiják (Killer), kteři se spolu utkávají na různorodých mapách a cílem přeživších je nastartovat 5 generátorů, nenechat se zabít a zároveň utéci zabijákovi, který je celou dobu snaží chytit a zabít je.

Pokud hrajete za přeživšíje potřeba po nastartování 5 generátorů je ještě potřeba otevřít 1 ze 2 bran a úteci. Generátory se startují pomocí držení levého tlačítka na myši a zárověň se občas objeví Quick time event, u kterého musíte zmáčknou ve správnou chvíli mezerník (space), pokud ho zmáčknete v nesprávnou chvíli hra vás potrestá prozrazením vaší pozice zabijákovi a ten si pro vás určitě rád přijde. Pokaždé pokud je u vás zabiják blízko rozezní se hudba která sílí a zeslabuje se, podle toho jak je od vás zabiják daleko. Pokud vás zabiják začne pronásledovat můžete využit palety nebo okna ke spomalení jeho pohybu a ulehčení vašeho útěku. Pokud vás poprvé zabiják praští, začnete kulhat a celkově se zpomalí váš pohyb, po další úderu již spadnete na zem a zabiják vás může vzít na rameno a odnést vás na 1 z jeho háků. Po cestě k háku se můžete bránit zběsilým mačkáním kláves A a D, ale pokud se zabijákovi povede vás na hák pověsit, ještě nezoufejte, protože vás 1 z vašich spoluhráču může zachránit, tím že vás z toho háku sundá. Bohužel oblíbená taktika zabijáku je, že čekají dokud neumřete a až potom teprve odejdou. Pokud se mu vás podaří sundat budete zranění, ale váš spoluhráč vás může vylečit stejným způsobem, jako se startuje generátor. Skoro za každou činnost co ve hře provádíte jste na konci kola obměněni body, za které si můžete vylepšovat postavu a získávat perky.

Pokud se rozhodnete hrát za zabijáka je vaším úkolem zabít co nejvíce přeživších a co nejvíce jim znepříjemnit útěk. Za každé zranění nebo zabití přeživího jste obměněn body, které také můžete použít na vylepšení zabijáka nebo přeživšího. Přeživší, které ho se vám podaří srazit na zem a poté vzít na rameno vám bude znepříjemňovat pohyb pomocí kláves A a D, ale pokud se vám ho včas podaří nabodnou na hák, než vám uteče, tak už je jeho osud vedšinou jistý.

Ve hře se také nacházejí předněty (itemy), které vám pomůžou lepé pžežít.
Baterka - pomocí baterky můžete oslepit zabijáka
Lékarnička - zkuste hádat -_-
Mapa - umožní vám vidět genrátory
Nářadí - umožňuje ničení háků

Celkové máte k dispozici 5 přeživších a 4 zabijáky, s ruznorodými vlastnostmi, které se můžete upravit podle svého gusta.

A teď něco z mého pohledu.
Velice se mi na Dead by Daylight líbí, jak se vývojáři snaží hru nadále opravovat, přidávat obsah a také obrovská komunita, která je velice aktivní. Bohužel hra je opravdu zabugovaná, mnoho bugů při samotném gameplayi, ale i při čekání na hru. Hru i přes spoustu problémů musím opravdu doporučit, kvůli její chytlavosti, kdy si říkáte: "teď už to je opravdu poslední hra"

This game is absolutely incredible.  Yes, it has a few bugs here and there, the matchmaking can be slow at times, and it can be frustrating to get used to.  HOWEVER, the devs for this game are awesome at what they do! They listen and respond to any and all player feedback and will often patch bugs brought up by the community within a day or 2 of the glitches being reported. 

It's a game heavily based on senses, skill, and techniques that make escaping/sacrificing other players feel super rewarding.

This is an excellent game. I was introduced to it while watching a youtuber play it in the background of one of his videos. I did some research and looked at gameplay videos, and was instantly hooked. The controls are fairly simple. Using the A-W-S-D keys and your mouse. In my personal opinion, I think that playing the killer is easier than playing a survivor. With the survivors, you have to turn on generators as objectives to power up the escape. What makes it difficult for the survivors is that there are multiple random skill checks on the odjectives that you have to timely push the spacebar to progress in the objective. However, I guess that's part of the difficulty of being a survivor because you also have to be aware of your surroundings watching for the killer. If you thoroughly enjoy horror movies, then you'll definitely enjoy this game.

This game really good. At first i wasent really goning to buy it just seeing the reviews and how no one can join a game but really execpt a few bugs this game is amazing the thrill of being chase bu one of the killers is scary and the joy if your the last person to escape while everyone had died. But playing with friends makes this game 10x much more fun. But one thing I do hate is the nurse. There are 3 words i can only say about her and that is FUCK THE NURSE. She is way to over powered but after a while you can escape her preety easily but it does take time. Being the killer for me is quite fun but can be really hard and sometimes boring but chasing someone is always. If your one of those people who camp the hook and stay there and no... okay JUST NO.

After what i said i can recommend this game a great thrill being chased awesome with friends and a very beatiul game and give it a 7/10

- Oyunda çıkma cezası olmaması 
- Kötü rank sistemi (çok kolay rank atlanıyor. Rankın yükseldiçe zorlaşması gerekirken dahada kolaylaşıyor)

เป็นเกมที่ต้องใช้เวลาเล่นพอสมควรหากคุณเล่นฝั่ง Survivor เริ่มเกมคุณจะไม่มี Perk อะไรที่ช่วยเหลือคุณเลย คุณจะต้องเก็บแต้ม Bloodpoint เพื่อนำไปอัพสกิล หรือ ไอเทมที่คุณสามารถนำมาใช้ในเกมได้ แต่ถ้าเล่นไปได้ช่วงหนึ่งพอมี Perk ที่สามารถช่วยตัวเองได้ คุณจะสนุกกับมันอย่างแน่นอน แนะนำว่าควรเล่นกับเพื่อนๆด้วยจะเพิ่มความฮา และสนุกขึ้นไปอีก

ส่วนฝั่ง Killer คุณแทบจะไม่ต้องใช้ Perk ในการช่วยเล่นเลยก็ยังได้ เพราะตัว Killer แต่ละตัวนั้นมีความสามารถเฉพาะตัวอยู่แล้ว สิ่งที่คุณต้องมีก็เพียงทักษะการเดาทางวิ่งการดักทาง และการสังเกตุให้ดีๆ เพราะมุมมองของ Killer จะสูงกว่า Survivor ทำให้บางครั้งถ้าคุณก้มหน้าลงมาเล็กน้อย คุณอาจกำลังพบ Survivor นั่งย่อ แอบอยู่ข้างๆขาของคุณก็ได้

8/10 ( อีก 2 ขอหักออกเพราะมีเรื่องของ Bug ในบางจุด แต่ทางทีมงานเค้าก็อัพเดทแก้ไขอยู่ตลอดเวลา และมีการปรับ Balance ด้วย )

Vale, borrón y cuenta nueva. Soy un jugador que empezó tras un mes y poco mas a empezar a jugar a este juego. Tras mucho tiempo descubri bugs, pero tambien descubrí lo bueno que era este juego. Las viciadas que tuve fueron enormes, dias y dias sin poder parar de pensar en levear, pero.. cuando faltaba contenido decidí cambiar de juego. Tras bastantes meses decidí volverlo a jugar, y descubrí sus puntos fuertes y débiles. Sus puntos fuertes es que el juego es genial, está muy bien hecho aunque tiene algunos bugs que te hace pensar si revisan y mejoran el juego. Añadieron nuevas dinámicas como es lo de golpear motores, cambiar los ganchos, nuevos mapas y ahora un superviviente sin DLCs. Un antiguo punto fuerte de este juego es la búsqueda de partidas, que ahora es horrible. Me he tenidp que cambiar a otra región de descargas solamente para poder jugar. En partidas de un jugador, es decir: tú solo, encuentra relativamente rápido, pero con amigos es horrible... puedes estar 30 minutos para una partida que luego dispone de un host horrible, espero que esto lo vayan arreglando ya que no me parece normal y es posible que sea lo que me haga dejar de jugar este juego. Gracias por su tiempo :)

Me banearon por tramposo no entiendo nada alguien me ayuda? 

Yo no hice nada y soy un pro y solo jugue normal no recomiendo por que pa que jugueis y os banen asi por que si y aun por encima pagando por el juego

One of the best games here in steam that i've ever played with. Rem. when you were a kid and you're afraid of watching horror movies with lots of blood and gore in it? Well,this is exactly what this game has to offer. When i first saw this game i was skeptical of buying it. Most of my friends told me that it's quite fun. So, i tried it and to tell you frankly after playing 3 straight hours of it i felt like i was a kid again running away from monsters and creepy crawly things that i was afraid of. So much adrenaline rush in this game and my heart is beating so fast. I felt like i was really inside of the game itself. Pros: good gamepplay,nice maps except for that asylum new map it's a bit bright imo. Killer can see you anywhere with his FOV. Great addition of the new killer which is the nurse which i think is that the devs got the idea of her from the previous silent hill games. As for me it's an awesome game that needs more polishing. Cons: Needs to have at least a dedicated or an official server so that people won't get lag spikes due to the host's location,matchmaking is really bad and it is clearly evident that there are still lots of bugs around within the game itself. Overall, I would recommend this game to a friend and maybe for those who are looking for some different type of gameplay there that can make your hearts go out. Well go and have it a try.Run and hide as long as you can :D 

8.5/10 cheers XD
Ein sehr geiles Game ;)
